---
title: "SelectDropdownOptionAction"
description: "Select an option from a dropdown"
---

The `id` field should be set to the select element's id. Then you can either set the `value` field to the option's text or the `option_id` field to the option's `id`.

**Example:**
```python
from notte_sdk import actions

session.execute(actions.SelectDropdownOption(id="country-select", value="United States"))
session.execute(actions.SelectDropdownOption(id="size-select", value="Large"))
```
